授業目的: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability to read, analyze, comprehend, discuss, and respond to authentic English articles on a variety of topics.
到達目標:
Students will be able to:
1. Read authentic articles on topics related to language, culture, and society
2. Analyze written texts from a variety of genres and react to them critically
3. Write a 1000 word argumentative research article on a topic in introduced in class
4. Give an 8-minute multimedia presentation based on the content of your article
5. Lead small group discussions on research articles found outside of class
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Classes are conducted face-to-face in the classroom.

第2回: What is academic writing? Opinion Essay about an Japan topic
第18回: WRITING - Thesis Statement, Body Paragraph 1 + 2 + 3 + introduction + conclusion
トピック.授業計画1:
Lessons held in the computer lab will be focused on research and writing for the final essay and presentation. Lessons held in normal classrooms will be for lectures, group discussions, and textbook activities.
Skills that will be highlighted in this course:
Writing an argumentative/persuasive essay that argues for one side of a global issue;
synthesizing information; quoting, paraphrasing, and summarizing, supporting opinions with facts and statistics, critical thinking, research skills, basic APA citation format, avoiding plagiarism, gathering data through field research
トピック.授業外学習2: Students must be highly motivated to succeed in this course. The will need to research, read, and prepare discussions for authentic English texts outside of class. Students must also work on their own research papers for homework.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Writing assignments (40%), Presentation (10%), Homework (20%), Leading discussions (15%), Participation (15%)
